data.communities: Will be discussed on mailinglists upon release
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
This module joins other modules in the Net::Google namespace that
    address interaction with the Google service. The CPAN does not
    currently hold any modules addressing the Gmail service, and as
    such, this module will be unique and not a duplication of others'
    efforts.
